text: Albert Mkrtchyan (, February 27, 1937 - February 28, 2018); Armenian movie director, screenwriter, and actor. He was honored with the People's Artist of the Republic of Armenia (2003).Альберт Мкртчян He was born in Gyumri, Soviet Union. His best known works are The Tango of Our Childhood, Tghamardik and The Song of the Old Days. Mkrtchyan died on February 28, 2018 in Yerevan, Armenia, one day after his 81st birthday.Renowned Armenian filmmaker Albert Mkrtchyan dies at 81 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Albert Mkrtchyan at AlloCiné Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Armenian movie directors Category:Armenian actors Category:Armenian writers Category:Screenwriters Category:20th-century Armenian people
title: Albert Mkrtchyan
